values:
I can see!

I can see!

I can see!

yay!

my mother just declared that she feels like throwing up everywhere.

this will be the return of the dreaded exam nerves again then, coupled with female TMI.

computing today....

 ew.

mum didn't really have to get up today. her computing teacher hasn't arrived, she's pissed off, and she would really like to go back to bed. please. buggrit, millenium hand and shrimp, etc comes from the remote classroom corner in that bloody oakham school place. I prefer my seat on the wardrobe, personally.

i'm still alive.
as the years go on, i get so much more real. there's a small patch on my back where all the fur is rubbed off now - a place that RachelCat rests her cheek against as she sleeps at night.
I love RachelCat, and she loves me.
she's my main woman, I her main man. i'll never betray her, or make her cry, like the others sometimes do...

i get to go to texas!
yaaay
i even am going as handluggage, so i can play in the plane.woohoooh!

i seem to be going on a journey.
I am wrapped round a very hard compressed sleeping bag in a black and yellow rucksack. on top of me seem to be a very short THING in army pattern, some tops, a black dress, and a beeblebear.
i am not too impressed about this seeing as mother had to sit on the bag to get it done up. i blame zaffi for being so fat.... 
THEN she proclaimed that there was another five to six hours to go before i will be unpacked.
she is a harsh mother indeed.

i have not been around for ages. i can't usually get to the computer as rachel spends all her free time hugging me and crying into my fur. why is she so down all the time? i know it has something to do with some friends and also that she is under a lot of stress from school , but shes not been talking much sense recently. in fact she is behaving really wierdly. 
anonymous bear please come and visit me. bring puppy and well go out on the town. it would be so so wonderful to see you. really it would.

@ max`s party everyone is v nice and me and mum are having great fun! 
she is much happier than usual !!!

i could have perished in that fire, but daemongirl had me. 
she took me to see the damage and i was astounded!!!!!
bring anonymous bear on sat and i will come too 
xx

mother been v upset this evening and has been giving me lts of hugs. whotheheckami was mean to me and she wacked him one or two. then she hid and cried because of all the memories coming back of when she had a family and not disjointed grumpy people.
shes letting me come to bed with her tonight.

mother was so upset that she lost the football match (and was being discreetly homesick at the same time) that i had to sleep on the floor.
it was VERY uncomfortable and now i have a carpet burn on my tummy.
still it saved me from becoming even more flat than i already am.....

night everyone 
anonymousbear i got my way... im nice and warm in rachels bed at home!
xxx
tell squaddie not to be horrid to you because im a grizzly bear and able to rip his throat out if he is mean to my friends...

Quiz of Doooooooom!
brought to you by Quizilla this looks like my mother, daemongirl doesn't it? still bored of school.....

Whats your Major Flaw
brought to you by Quizilla zzz

take the death quiz.
and go to mewing.net. laura = great.
ha.ha.ha.

Bugger. now i have been rumbled.
shouldn't have made Smellycake my friend. 
NOW chaoshedgerow of all people is on my lj 
eurggghhhh. 
nasty man.
he hates me you know.
so does Bloody mendi.
she wants to WASH me 
Help!

this made me feel a whole load bloody better....

Profile for Grizzly
 
Personality type: Unlovable, uncommunicative, stupid, bossy, egomaniac, jerk.
 
Unlovable
No matter what you do, no one likes you and no one even notices you exist. You very rarely, if ever, have meaningful relationships of any kind with anything other than your own anatomy.
 
Uncommunicative
You find it impossible to express your true feelings or emotions. Your friends (if you have any) think you are a liar, an unfeeling bastard or retarded. Probably all three.
 
Stupid
You are basically thick. If you think back, you will realise this is true. Most people you meet are smarter than you. This is because you are stupid. Ask a friend to explain this to you if some of the words are too long.
 
Bossy
You are constantly telling people what to do. This is because you are basically incompetent and lazy. People make voodoo dolls of you and put them through paper shredders.
 
Egomaniac
You have a bloated self image. Somehow you think you are more than the web surfing loser the rest of the world sees you as. 
 
Your rating as a human being:
21%

The person/character whom you most resemble is:
Garth Brookes (country "musician") 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am bored.
I am at school while my MOTHER is at home aving a fun time.
all the other teddies are stuck up, and i am the only REAL one here. 
grrrr.
Also i overheard my mother on the phone to trouble saying that she may not be taking me to ireland.
that upsets me a lot. 
I always used to be her best friend.
now she has a snotty hankie instead of me. i'm feeling left out and lonely, all by myself in the dark......
booo hooo hoooo
